languages.text: {n}"Искры", похожие на глаза, выкрашены в оранжево-желтый цвет — оттенок, который, вы уверены, подобный монитор не способен отображать. Чуть наклонившись вперед, вы слышите утробный рык в глубинах устройства — звук, исполненный ненависти и голода.{/n}

{n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Искры", похожие на глаза, выкрашены в оранжево-желтый цвет — оттенок, который, вы уверены, подобный монитор не способен отображать. Чуть наклонившись вперед, вы слышите утробный рык в глубинах устройства — звук, исполненный ненависти и голода.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The eye-like "sparks" are colored orange-ish yellow, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid color. You lean forward and here a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

{n}The eye-like "sparks" are colored orange-ish yellow, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid color. You lean forward and here a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

{n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

{n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}屏幕上的橙黄色的火花仿佛眼睛一般。你很确信，这台显示器根本无法显示如此明亮的色调。你向前倾着身子，听到机器内部传来了充满掠食意味的咆哮声，声音中满是仇恨与饥渴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}屏幕上的橙黄色的火花仿佛眼睛一般。你很确信，这台显示器根本无法显示如此明亮的色调。你向前倾着身子，听到机器内部传来了充满掠食意味的咆哮声，声音中满是仇恨与饥渴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos como chispas son de color naranja amarillento, pero estás completamente segur{mf|o|a} de que este monitor no puede proyectar un tono tan vivo. Te inclinas hacia delante y oyes un gruñido depredador que proviene del interior del dispositivo. Es una mezcla de odio y hambre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos como chispas son de color naranja amarillento, pero estás completamente segur{mf|o|a} de que este monitor no puede proyectar un tono tan vivo. Te inclinas hacia delante y oyes un gruñido depredador que proviene del interior del dispositivo. Es una mezcla de odio y hambre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目のような火花は黄色がかったオレンジ色をしているが、このモニターがそれほど鮮やかな色合いを表示できないことは明らかだ。本体に体を近づければ、装置の中から憎悪と飢えに満ちた獲物を探すような唸り声が聞こえてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目のような火花は黄色がかったオレンジ色をしているが、このモニターがそれほど鮮やかな色合いを表示できないことは明らかだ。本体に体を近づければ、装置の中から憎悪と飢えに満ちた獲物を探すような唸り声が聞こえてきた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die augenähnlichen Funken sind orange-gelblich, aber du bist ziemlich sicher, dass dieser Monitor einen derart lebendigen Farbton gar nicht darstellen kann. Du lehnst dich nach vorne und hörst aus dem Inneren des Geräts ein Raubtierknurren, voller Hass und Hunger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die augenähnlichen Funken sind orange-gelblich, aber du bist ziemlich sicher, dass dieser Monitor einen derart lebendigen Farbton gar nicht darstellen kann. Du lehnst dich nach vorne und hörst aus dem Inneren des Geräts ein Raubtierknurren, voller Hass und Hunger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les étincelles semblables à des yeux sont d'une couleur jaune-orange, alors même que cet écran ne devrait pas être capable d'afficher de telles nuances. Au moment où vous vous penchez pour regarder de plus près, vous entendez un grognement affamé, féroce et plein de haine venir de l'intérieur de l'appareil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les étincelles semblables à des yeux sont d'une couleur jaune-orange, alors même que cet écran ne devrait pas être capable d'afficher de telles nuances. Au moment où vous vous penchez pour regarder de plus près, vous entendez un grognement affamé, féroce et plein de haine venir de l'intérieur de l'appareil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözü andıran parıltılar, sarıya çalan turuncu rengiyle göz alıyor. Ekranın, renkleri bu kadar canlı gösteremeyeceğinden neredeyse adın kadar eminsin. Ekrana doğru hafifçe eğilince cihazın hırıldadığını, hiddetin ve açlığın sesini duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eye-like sparks are yellowish orange in colour, but you are pretty sure this monitor cannot display such a vivid hue. You lean forward, and you hear a predatory growl coming from inside the device, a sound full of hatred and hunger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözü andıran parıltılar, sarıya çalan turuncu rengiyle göz alıyor. Ekranın, renkleri bu kadar canlı gösteremeyeceğinden neredeyse adın kadar eminsin. Hafifçe ekrana doğru eğilince cihazdan bir hırıltı yükseliyor. Bu ses, hiddet ve açlığın sesi.{/n}
